name: Holy Spring
description: A sacred spring blessed by divine power provides healing waters and spiritual renewal, attracting pilgrims and those seeking divine intervention. The holy nature provides protection and healing, while the religious significance can attract both devotees and those who would desecrate it.
atmosphere: Sacred waters bubble with divine power and healing energy. Air carries pure water, divine blessing, and spiritual renewal scent. Skin tingles with presence of holy power and divine intervention. Taste of healing waters and spiritual renewal fills mouth. Weight of divine protection and religious significance presses down like gentle blessing.
